urls.title: FWW20 PROJECTS WaterBlitz
urls.description: Spring WaterBlitz 7-10 May 2021 Thames Valley | Dublin | Paris | Luxembourg Be a citizen scientist. Test water quality near you. ‚ÄÉ ‚ÄÉ ‚ÄÉ ‚ÄÉ What is a WaterBlitz? A WaterBlitz is a

text: @MarthaCrockatt @Westoxongreens @Earthwatch_Eur @thameswater @EnvAgency @UK_CEH @WildOxfordshire Finally, we will be sending a list of recommended personal actions to everyone who took part in the #WaterBlitz based on our findings. Again, keep an eye on our website for developments. https://t.co/QaGTHNjOc6
RT @WSCCResilience: A Flood Alert has been issued by @EnvAgency: https://t.co/oKan8GHfvi for the Rivers Eden & Eden Brook, for 4th Oct. Ple‚Ä¶

@MarthaCrockatt @Westoxongreens @Earthwatch_Eur @thameswater @EnvAgency @UK_CEH Thirdly, we continue to work with @WildOxfordshire to ensure that @thameswater understand what is needed to deliver on their promise of a ‚ÄúSmarter Water Catchment‚Äù for the Evenlode.

@MarthaCrockatt @Westoxongreens @Earthwatch_Eur @thameswater @EnvAgency @UK_CEH Secondly, we have been able to use the process to identify areas where volunteer groups are working hard to improve things. We are desperate to support these groups with further monitoring tools so we are seeking funding to do just that.

@MarthaCrockatt @Westoxongreens @Earthwatch_Eur @thameswater We have lots of plans!

Firstly, the data and findings will be shared with the @EnvAgency, who will use it to inform their work. Keep an eye on our webpage - we will soon be releasing some maps showing how the two datasets work together, thanks to our friends at @UK_CEH...

‚ÄúThe @EnvAgency and [environment department] should both hang their heads in shame, because it is they that have allowed the water companies to get away with this shocking performance.‚Äù #water companies receive worst pollution ratings for 8 years  https://t.co/mwpJY2U63g via @FT
